Contributor: Thomson Printing Co., printer.; Pennsylvania. Committee of Safety, publisher.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text is a message to the boys of Pennsylvania United States Boy's Working Reserve from President Woodrow Wilson. In the message the president expresses his appreciation of the work undertaken by the Boys'Working Reserve. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Pa. : Pennsylvania Committee of Public Safety, Dept. of Civilian Service and Labor,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Physical Description: 1 poster : blue and white ; 71 x 53 cm.
Subject: World War, 1914-1918 -- War work -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: President Wilson's message
